metadata.title: CVE-2019-20367 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
nlist.c in libbsd before 0.10.0 has an out-of-bounds read during acomparison for a symbol name from the string table (strtab).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20367` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbsd0 - 0.8.7-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libbsd package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.7-1ubuntu0.1').
